ensure-app-running.description: Ensures the Next.js application is always running on port 3000

post-implementation.description: Check webapp status after implementation changes

verify-app-status.command: lsof -i:3000 > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✅ App running on port 3000' || echo '❌ App not running - run ./hooks/ensure-app-running.sh'
